Elevators v1.0

Core Package
elevator Provides classes and interfaces for the Elevators application which models the hardware of elevators (motors, cabins, doors, scale, inside and floor buttons).

 
Extension Packages (Remote interfaces and servants)
elevator.rmi Provides remote interfaces for controlling and monitoring the elevator.Elevators application via Java RMI and a class (MakeAll) which is used to obtain remote references (stubs) with these interfaces.
elevator.rmi.impl Provides classes implementing remote interfaces defined in the elevator.rmi package for controlling components of elevators (motors, doors and scales) and for monitoring elevator and floor buttons as well as positions of moving elevators via Java RMI.

 
Other Packages
elevator.demo Contains the primary class of the AminationDemo application which illustrates a way of controlling the elevator.Elevators application via Java RMI.
